entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then clearing. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to 800 metres this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
